# ownerDisplayName

**Instance Property**

The name of the person that receives a shared pass.

## Declaration

```swift
var ownerDisplayName: String { get }
```

## Displaying information on the share sheet

- **passThumbnailImage**: A thumbnail image of a pass that the system displays on the sharing sheet.
- **localizedDescription**: A longer form of the pass description that the system displays on the sharing sheet.
